entry.title: WIND WARNING , Fort Erie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:41 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers early this afternoon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 80 increasing to 60 gusting to 100 early this afternoon. High 15. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:22 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 then light after midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:22 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. Rain beginning in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:22 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or snow. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 11:22 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. High zero. Forecast issued 11:22 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 11:22 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:22 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
